titleStmt.title: The second part of the famous history of the seauen champions of Christendome Likevvise shevving the princely provvesse of Saint Georges three sonnes, the liuely sparke of nobilitie. VVith many other memorial atchiuements worthy the golden spurres of knighthood.
Most famous history of the seven champions of Christendome. Part 2
titleStmt.author: Johnson, Richard, 1573-1659?

titleStmt.title: The second part of the famous history of the seauen champions of Christendome Likevvise shevving the princely provvesse of Saint Georges three sonnes, the liuely sparke of nobilitie. VVith many other memorial atchiuements worthy the golden spurres of knighthood.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by E. Allde?] for Cuthbert Burbie, and are to be solde at his shop, vnder the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The second part of the seuen champions.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
